Title: Memorandum for Newcomer Exiles
Text:
To fling/report a man's name: to report a name
Stifled, not shining steel: inconvenient to report the name
Empty: a white person who doesn't know the lingo
Tuanchun: to communicate in the lingo
Tuan Shui: handing over SHC money

There are too many unintelligible words here, so I'll memorize the important ones first, and the others will be taken as they come, and I'm sure I can survive here with a little effort!
